title: Tenant Onboarding
description: This is the tenant onboarding page. Here you can set up your tenant's initial configuration and preferences.
welcomeMessage: Welcome to the tenant onboarding process!

step1.title: Step 1: Basic Information
step1.description: Please provide the basic information for your tenant, such as name and contact details.

step2.title: Step 2: Preferences
step2.description: Set your tenant's preferences, including language, timezone, and notification settings.

step3.title: Step 3: Review and Confirm
step3.description: Review the information you have provided and confirm to complete the onboarding process.

step4.title: Step 4: Completion
step4.description: Congratulations! You have completed the tenant onboarding process.

errorMessage: An error occurred during the onboarding process. Please try again later or contact support if the issue persists.
successMessage: Your tenant has been successfully onboarded!
loadingMessage: Loading tenant onboarding data, please wait...
confirmationMessage: Are you sure you want to complete the onboarding process? This action cannot be undone.
tenantOnboardingDescription: Follow the steps below to onboard your tenant successfully.
completionMessage: Your tenant has been successfully onboarded! You can now start using the application with your new tenant settings.
